name: GENIUS Liquid Skin Resurfacing 2% BHA Toner
about: What it is: A pore-clarifying, exfoliating toner to visibly smooth texture while unclogging congestion and addressing excess oil for supple-, healthy-looking skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Pores, Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:- Patented Alguronic Acid: Reduces the look of lines and wrinkles while addressing environmental damage..- Exclusive Biomimetic Collagen: A visibly plumping ingredient that makes skin feel smoother and more supple..- BHA (Salicylic Acid) 2%: Exfoliates, unclogs pores, and visibly refines skin's texture...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: Made with an exclusive form of alguronic acid, exclusive biomimetic collagen, azelaic acid, and two percent salicylic acid, this nonirritating formula effectively exfoliates to reduce the look of pores. It visibly refines texture and evens tone, leaving skin feeling purified and restored. It also addresses hormonal skin concerns...Clinical Results: In a self-assessment of 25 test subjects participating in a 4-week clinical study, results included:.- 100% said it leaves skin purified immediately after one use.- 96% said it gently exfoliates to visibly smooth and resurface skin texture immediately after one use.- 100% said skin feels smoother, healthier, and restored and looks refreshed after 10 days of use
ingredients: -Patented Alguronic Acid: Reduces the look of lines and wrinkles while addressing environmental damage..-Exclusive Biomimetic Collagen: A visibly plumping ingredient that makes skin feel smoother and more supple.-BHA (Salicylic Acid) 2%: Exfoliates, unclogs pores, and visibly refines skin's texture....Water (Aqua, Eau), Propanediol, Salicylic Acid, Niacinamide, Collagen Amino Acids*, Parachlorella Beijerinckii Exopolysaccharides, Collagen*, Azelaic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Lauryl Glucoside, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Dextrin, Amylopectin, Polydextrose, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Phytic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol....* Hydrolyzed Collagen is created by binding vegetable fibers together to create vegan, plant-based amino acids resulting in biomimetic collagen that is nearly identical in structure and function to animal-derived collagen.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use daily after cleansing..-Soak a cotton ball, then gently swipe over your entire face, neck, and decollete..-Follow with moisturizer..-Use only as directed. .-For daytime use, follow with sunscreen.
